wm-license-gfdl-1.2-and-later: Soli biɛni ni sabbu ŋɔ tooi yaai, n-tari ka/bee m-mali niŋ n-doli '''[[{{int:wm-license-gfdl-wiki-link}}|GNU zalisi Gbaŋ ŋmabu shahira gbaŋ din nyɛ yoli]]''', Bali shɛli din nyɛ 1.2 bee bali shɛli dabam din na yɛn yina ka [[{{int:wm-license-fsf-wiki-link}}|Free Software Foundation]]; yɛn zaŋ li bahina pɔhim zuɣu ka ka Invariant Yaɣa, ka ka Tooni-Gbaŋ Pɔbirili Sabbu, ka lahi ka Nyaaŋa-Gbaŋ Pɔbirili Sabbu. Lala shahira gbaŋ maa ŋmali nyɛla din be yaɣ' shɛli din yuli booni ''[[{{int:wm-license-gfdl-full-1.2-link}}|GNU Free Documentation License]]''.
